description.@en: I conjure thee, creatures of the night—infest their minds, let fear take flight!

criticalFailure.@en: The draught turns to fumes, and you suffer from its effects instead.

effect.@en: After successfully casting, a draught is created. Once consumed, it tastes of sweet syrup. The foe must Resist with a Toughness Test, or go to Sleep for six hours. For six nights, they awaken to Incapacitated!.

reagents.@en: A vial of your own spit and bile, mixed into a draught (expended)
